name: The Invisible Hours
description: The Invisible Hours is a complex murder mystery in VR, in which players freely explore an intricate web of interwoven stories within a sprawling mansion. This is not a game. This is not a movie. This is a piece of immersive theatre with many tangled threads.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / 970 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 9 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
